content: We present you the new Bitcoin Roll Dice Game Script with which you can create your own Bitcoin dice game. Start your cryptocurrency project with this incredible bitcoin software that will make you earn a lot of money and will help you create a solid Bitcoin system and project.https://bitcoinsoftwares.online/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/bitcoin-roll-dice-game-script-1535x2048.pngFeatures for Guest-Fully Responsive Design.-Fully Dynamic Frontend.-Login & Registration System.-Payment Proof.-Site Stats.-Features for Member-User Dashboard System.-Manage Balance.-Memberships System.-PTC Ads System.-Advertise System.-Dice Game.-History.-Referral System.-Withdraw System (FaucetPay.io and direct wallet).-Deposit System.-Faucet System.And Much More.Features for Admin-Manage Dice Game.-Manage Members.-Manage Referral Commission.-Manage Memberships.-Manage Deposits.-Manage Withdraws.-Manage Referral System.-Manage Payment Gateway.-Manage Website Settings.Requirements-Linux or Windows (+SSH Access or terminal in windows).-HDD Space.-Using API Need 1 GB ( coinbase,blockchain,block.io).-Node: v10x.-NPM: v6x.-Apache.-SSL.Link: https://bitcoinsoftwares.online/product/bitcoin-roll-dice-game-script/
